data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Clistoabdominalis Skevington (Diptera: Pipunculidae) from Iran, with a key to the Western Palaearctic species of the Clistoabdominalis ruralis group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kazerani, Farzaneh, Kehlmaier, Christian (2018): A new species of the genus Clistoabdominalis Skevington (Diptera: Pipunculidae) from Iran, with a key to the Western Palaearctic species of the Clistoabdominalis ruralis group. Zootaxa 4425 (3): 582-588, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4425.3.11
